data.name: favText
data.value:
No favorites episodes set. Tap and hold an episode to add it here.
Tap and hold an episode in this list (if present) to remove it from favorites

data.name: trialMessageEpisodes
data.value:
Sorry, but you can watch only first five episodes into trial version...
Do you want to buy full version?

data.name: error_buy
data.value: Error during Windows Phone Store connection! Please try again later or buy app from Store web page

data.name: error_store
data.value: Error during Windows Phone Store connection! Please try again later!

data.name: ExceptionMessage
data.value: A problem occurred the last time you ran this app :( Would you like to send an email to report it?

data.name: disclaimerMessage
data.value:
DISCLAIMER:
This app is based on a public list of web videos links. Videos are hosted on YouTube servers and are not controlled by developers, that decline all responsibility for their content. If you want to request removal of a link, report broken/wrong link, contribute to expansion of the list, feel free to contact app authors. Names, trademarks, logos, text, graphics, images, sounds, videos, contained within this app belong to their respective owners.

data.name: brokenLinkQuestion
data.value: :( Sorry, I can't find this video... Do you want to send an email to developers?

data.name: DownloaderPage_Infos_Stage_DwnCompletedWithError
data.value:
:( Oh no . . .
Some episodes were not correctly downloaded: please retry backup procedure... Downloaded episodes will be maintained.

data.name: DownloaderPage_Infos_Stage_DwnCompletedWithSuccess
data.value:
Well done!!!
All episodes are available into your phone: you'll no longer need internet connection!
Enjoy them! :)

data.name: DownloaderPage_Infos_Stage_Welcome
data.value:
Hi! Here you can download all episodes from web!
Once done you can use app offline, all episodes will be available forever into your phone: internet connection will no longer required!

data.name: DownloaderPage_Infos_Stage_DwnEpisodesInProgress
data.value:
Download in progress, please be patient :)
Please do not exit this page, otherwise you will need to restart backup procedure . . .

data.name: MessageAbortDownload
data.value: You will need to repeat entire backup procedure, are you sure?

data.name: MessageAlreadyOffline
data.value: You have already done backup procedure, would you like to redo it?

data.name: UserMessageDownloadKo
data.value: :( Sorry, something went wrong... Do you want to send an email to developers containing error details?

data.name: DownloaderPage_Infos_Stage_LinksCheckedWithErrors
data.value:
:( Youtube removed some episodes...
Please use button below to report problem to support: episodes will be fixed in 12-24h and you will receive an email when done.

data.name: trialMessageBackup
data.value:
Sorry, but backup feature is not available into trial version...
Do you want to buy full version?

data.name: possibleWrongBackup
data.value: Selected episode was not found into phone. Maybe backup procedure hasn't completed correctly: please retry operation.

data.name: notEnoughSpace
data.value: :( not enough space on device to save episodes... Required space: {0} Gb

data.name: wifiRequired
data.value: A wi-fi connection is required for download!

data.name: DownloaderPage_Infos_Stage_DwnCompletedWithConnectionError
data.value:
:( Oh no . . .
Wi-fi connection is no longer active... Please exit app, disable and enable wi-fi connection into phone settings and retry backup. Downloaded episodes will be maintained.

data.name: DownloadEpisodesQuestion
data.value: Do you want to download episodes into your phone and watch them forever without internet connection? :)

data.name: RatingMessage1
data.value:
We'd love you to rate our app 5 stars :)
Showing us some love on the store helps us to continue to work on the app and make things even better!

data.name: RatingMessage2
data.value:
You look to be getting a lot of use out of our app!
Why not give us a 5 star rating to show your appreciation?

data.name: ServerTemporaryUnavailable
data.value: Server temporary unavailable :( Please try again later... if problem persists please contact support

data.name: SpaceRequiredWarn
data.value: Offline episodes will occupy about {0}Gb of your phone memory. Continue?

data.name: FavoritesOnlyInOfflineMode
data.value: Sorry but this feature is available only in offline mode, do you want to download episodes right now?

data.name: OfflineRevertWarning
data.value: Sorry but current episodes offline backup is not more valid: this version changed episodes catalogue and a new backup is neeeded!... a lot of new episodes were added! Do you want to backup right now?

data.name: CannotFindSDCard
data.value: Sorry but I can't find SD card into your phone, insert card or retry download selecting another option

data.name: BackupMediatypeRequest
data.value: Where do you want to save your offline episodes?

data.name: ItemPhoneMemoryDesc
data.value: Episodes will be saved into phone's internal memory

data.name: ItemSDCardDesc
data.value: Episodes will be saved into SD memory expansion card

data.name: SDCardErrorInitGoOnline
data.value: Cannot find SD card: app will run in "online mode"

data.name: NotEnoughSpaceOnSDCard
data.value: Sorry but SD card ha not available free space (required: {0}, available {1}).\nDo you want to store episode into your phone memory?

data.name: noNetworkAvailableAppRestartRequired
data.value: Internet connection not available: please turn it on and restart app :)

data.name: recoUIText
data.value: tell me what episode you want :)

data.name: recoUISample
data.value: prova a dire "Pozzanghere di fango" o "Nascondino"...
